entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
